segments.text: Good.Now what kind of job do you want ? Mr.Wilson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't mind really.Perhaps a job in a shop or a factory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I know Brown's Biscuit Factory are looking for a porter.They pay $ 200 a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good.Now here's the address of the factory.The manager's name is ...
segments.speaker: S1
